lines.text:
[First Lines]
"Mohawk local arrival on plat 28. From Ipswich Falls, Waterbury, Watertown, Waterville, Elmira, Broken Arrow, Minnetonka, Harkensville, Dobbs Corner, New Paradise, and Red Hook.

lines.character: Loretta Dalrymple, aka Miss Dawn Glory

lines.text: [said while the plane they are in is doing loops]

lines.character: Loretta Dalrymple, aka Miss Dawn Glory

lines.text: Ooh! I've found my dream man and I've never been so h-h-happy in all my life.
lines.character: Loretta Dalrymple, aka Miss Dawn Glory
